title: Review: FiveTen TrailCross Gore-Tex Waterproof MTB Shoes for Flat Pedals
content:
When FiveTen launched the TrailCross Gore-Tex Mountain Bike Shoe earlier this year, they promised the holy grail of winter riding kit; waterproof flat pedal shoes. I absolutely had to get my feet in a pair. Where better to test waterproof kit than the midst of a Scottish winter? In addition to the countless puddles ploughed

The post Review: FiveTen TrailCross Gore-Tex Waterproof MTB Shoes for Flat Pedals appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
